item.description:
Join us THIS Saturday November 5th 1:00 – 3:30 p.m.
We will have Health & Product Demonstrations by: *Tai Chi demonstration & mini class by Sifu Pasquale & U.M.A.C Student’s class demonstration at 2:15 p.m. *Sacred Tree Massage by Nancy Gebhardt – foot massages *Beverly Massage by Kerilee Drew Pelletrino, LMT - mini chair massages *Franson Family Chiropractic for Pediatric development
& Adult Hea...lth – free Spinal Screenings   * Foster & Flourish by Jaclyn Foster Wellness Coach will teach how to write & achieve your goals


*Acupuncture & Chinese Herbs by Nicole Stockholm
*Shaklee Non-toxic Cleaning Products by Emily Taft *Reiki Healing by Nancy Fleming *Motives Cosmetic Line - mini cosmetic makeovers *Skin Rejuvenation Center & Spa / Finger Tip Nail - skincare 20 Locust Street, Suite 100 Danvers MA 01923 (978) 762-0454 www.danversmartialarts.com See More

 

Health & Wellness Fair Saturday, November 5 at 1:00pm, United Martial Arts Center for Health & Well Being
